description:
The sun has met its match with our Lost Sol collection. Designed to provide UPF protection for any occasion, these versatile tops are sure to find a spot in your bag any time you pack for adventure. And while the prAna Lost Sol Long Sleeve Shirt for men might look like your average good-looking button down, it's anything but. Packed with performance, this shirt is designed to take you from the trail to the brewery without missing a beat.

Incredibly breathable, with sweat-wicking properties you'll appreciate on a hike, it also has mesh venting in the back and added airflow by the armpits to keep you cool. Throw in sun protection, and you'll realize you've found the one shirt that does the job of two so you can pack less and do more.
name: Prana Lost Sol LS Shirt - Slim - Mens
